Phoenix::

She blinks, then remembers that compared to most bots, her beast form 
practically vanishes when she converts to robot mode - with the 
glaring exception of her wings.  "Who me?  I'm a golden eagle."  She 
demonstrates by assuming her beast mode.  "Why?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Switchblade --
> 
> Switchblade's head turns to watch Pheonix as she enters the control 
> room. He eyes her a bit and nods his approval. He briefly wonders 
> whether she is flaunting herself at all, but being the task 
oriented 
> bot he is, he quickly gets down to business.
> 
> "Yes... I can see that." He says calmly after a short but 
> uncomfortable -- probably for only Pheonix though -- 
> silence. "Here's where we're going," he lights up a 3d map, and 
> pinpoints a valley-like area somewhat north of the Predacon 
> base, "so not the coordinates, and follow me."
> 
> He begins to head for the door, when a side though strikes 
> him, "What transformation capabilities do you have?"
